posts.title: Glass Skull Ice Bucket
posts.content: Keep a cool head as you work hard concocting alcoholic delights with help from the glass skull ice bucket. This realistically shaped skull bucket is made from thick crystal clear glass and comes with two short handles on each side for easy lifting.

posts.title: Envelope X-Ray Spray
posts.content: A few spritz of the envelope x-ray spray and you’ll be able to temporarily spy on your significant other’s mail without them ever finding out. Let your inner <del>psycho</del> spy reign free on all the mail that enters your home without anyone finding out – NSA style.

posts.title: Game Of Thrones CLUE
posts.content: Introducing CLUE: The Game Of Thrones edition – the only version where everyone is probably the killer. The double sided game board lets you play in 2 different locations while the 12 suspects are represented by characters from the highly acclaimed TV series.

posts.title: How To Survive A Sharknado Book
posts.content: Learn the skills you need to thrive in the post-apocalyptic world of monsters with the How to Survive a Sharknado book. With the invaluable information found inside, you’ll be able to stay alive in dire situations such as a firenado or an attack by the Mothman.

posts.title: Light Up Radio Control Shark
posts.content: Terrorize friends and family with the light up radio control shark. This mechanized carnivore comes to life in the dark. When the lights go off, the shark glows bright as he swiftly swims across the floor, fiercely chomping its jaws while in search of its next prey.

posts.title: Spaghetti Fork
posts.content: Keep your sauce-drenched pasta from falling off by using the spaghetti fork to slurp it down. Available in two sizes, each specially designed fork features four nodes along the outer tines that help you twirl long and messy pasta like a pro without the use of a spoon.

posts.title: Solar Fairy String Lights
posts.content: Give your garden a magical nighttime glow without raising the electric bill by illuminating your yard using these solar fairy string lights. They’re waterproof, glow in a bevy of vibrant colors and can stay lit for up to eight full hours when fully charged.

posts.title: A Christmas Story Leg Lamp
posts.content: There’s no need to enter a sweepstakes in order to own the classy leg lamp from the beloved holiday film A Christmas Story. This stylish light fixture is a miniature replica of the one from the film and makes a great gift idea for the home of any movie buff.

posts.title: Jewelry & Eyeglass Cleaner
posts.content: Keep your valuables looking as pristine as the day you bought them with help from this jewelry and eyeglass cleaner. This powerful cleaning system emits 42,000 ultrasonic waves per second to gently remove dirt and grime off of jewelry and eyewear.

posts.title: The Circular Pizza Saw
posts.content: Pizza cutting is serious business, and to get the job done right you need a serious tool: the circular pizza saw. This fully functional pizza circular saw is dishwasher safe and has a removable shield for easy clean up after you wreak havoc on the poor defenseless pizza.

posts.title: Plant/Garden Soil Sensor Meter
posts.content: Help maintain the perfect environment for your flowers to flourish with this plant/garden soil sensor meter. This electricity-free and battery-free device features an easy to read color coded numbered scale that informs you of the soil’s moisture content at any given time.

posts.title: Harry Potter Boots Bookmark
posts.content: Quidditch’s top seeker sweeps in for the save in the form of this Harry Potter boots bookmark. Handmade from polymer clay, the bookmark creates the illusion Harry’s plunged right into your book as his boots and broom stick out.
